name: Arena Highroller
description:
Arena Highroller - submission for Mini Jam 83: Dread.

Roll the center die and reach the end of this little arena. Watch out for high numbers - the further you move, the worse things gets! Possibly similar to a specific bossfight in a specific game my friends have been playing recently...

---

Controlls:

       move left / right

Z            jump

X           attack

Shift     run

Esc       exit
